nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Intergalactic Adventure Activity Book

The Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Intergalactic Adventure Activity Book is a Star Wars Legends children's book based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It was published by Grosset & Dunlap on July 26, 2008.

Ladybird Books published a hardcover edition for the United Kingdom on August 7, 2008, titled Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Intergalactic Adventures. This edition included a lightsaber pencil on the front cover.

Join your favorite Star Wars characters and brand-new Clone Wars Padawan, Ahsoka, in this action-packed activity and puzzle book. Work through a series of exciting missions and help keep evil at bay. It's time to let the battles commence ...
Break codes, solve puzzles and keep evil at bay with this fun-packed Clone Wars activity book and free lightsaber pen!

Join your favorite Star Wars characters and brand new Clone Wars Padawan, Ahsoka, in this action-packed activity and puzzle book. Work through exciting missions using your lightsaber pen and help to keep evil at bay. It's time to let the battles commence.
An exciting addition to any Star Wars fan's collection.
